## Final Project 

### Dependencies

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

### Data Aquisition

```{r}
wrn <- as.data.frame(read.csv("data/nyc_wrn_db.csv"))
fam_viol <- read.csv("data/nyc_fam_viol.csv")
```

### Data Tidying

```{r}
wrn_dv <- wrn %>% filter(domestic_violence=="Y") %>% select(-domestic_violence, -address2, -bbl, -bin, -is_registered_with_the_attorney_general_s_office, -city, -fax, -foundation, -none_of_the_above, -nourl, -phone, -url, -borough, -census_tract, -published, -outsideloc, -outsidelocdesc) %>% droplevels()

wrn_dv %>% head()
```
